description: This guy from Slovakia had a very interesting career path. He finished a technical oriented high school but didn´t follow the trade. Instead he started working as an orderly at a hospital. He liked the job but it wasn´t paid well. That´s why he decided to improve his qualification at a medical high school in order to get himself ready for a promotion he was promised. But they lied to him. So he decided to finally put his tech skills into use and became a field service technician. That was much better because I had a perfectly fitting job for him. Everyone would be thrilled to have such a nice and dedicated employee. Only if the guy could afford our hiring fee. Also moving to Prague from Slovakia can be very expensive. I had a few ideas how to help him. And the boy was smart...
title: Dirty Scout 152
